Package HMS.Systems

Class AppointmentSystem

java.lang.Object
HMS.Systems.AppointmentSystem
public class AppointmentSystem extends Object
A system to manage user appointments, including the ability to create, update, and cancel appointments. It allows users to schedule and view appointments, as well as manage appointments for specific users.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentSystem

      public AppointmentSystem()

  • Method Details

    • addDoctorAvailabilityMenu

      public static void addDoctorAvailabilityMenu(String doctorID)
      Prompts the user to input an available time slot for a given doctor and adds it to the doctor's availability list. The input is validated to ensure it is in the correct format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm). The time is also checked to ensure it falls within the valid hours (09:00 to 17:00). If the slot is already in the availability list, it is not added again.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for whom the availability is being set.

    • displayAllDoctorsAvailability

      public static void displayAllDoctorsAvailability()
      Displays all doctors with their available slots in a table format. Each doctor ID is displayed alongside their available time slots. If a doctor has no available slots, a message stating "No slots available" is shown.

    • displayDoctorAvailability

      public static void displayDoctorAvailability(String doctorID)
      Displays the availability for a specific doctor based on the provided doctor ID. If no availability is found for the doctor, a message is shown stating that no availability is set.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose availability is being displayed.

    • removeDoctorAvailability

      public static void removeDoctorAvailability(String doctorID)
      Prompts the user to select a slot to remove from a given doctor's availability list. If no availability is set for the doctor, a message is shown. Once a valid slot is selected, it is removed from the list, and the changes are saved.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose availability is being modified.

    • getAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointments()
      Returns a list of all appointments.
      Returns:
      List of appointments.

    • getAppointmentsByPatient

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByPatient(String patientID, List<AppointmentStatus> statuses)
      Retrieves appointments for a specific patient filtered by status.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
      statuses - the list of statuses to filter by (nullable for all statuses).
      Returns:
      a list of matching appointments.

    • displayAllAppointments

      public static void displayAllAppointments()
      Displays all appointments regardless of status or person.

    • displayAppointmentsByPatient

      public static void displayAppointmentsByPatient(String patientID, List<AppointmentStatus> statuses)
      Displays appointments for a specific patient filtered by status.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
      statuses - the list of statuses to filter by (nullable for all statuses).

    • selectDoctorWithAvailableSlots

      public static String selectDoctorWithAvailableSlots()
      Displays a list of doctors with available slots and prompts the user to select a doctor to book an appointment with. If no doctors have available slots, a message is displayed indicating this. The method returns the selected doctor ID or null if no selection is made.
      Returns:
      The doctor ID of the selected doctor, or null if no valid doctor is selected or if there are no available doctors.

    • selectSlotForDoctor

      public static Date selectSlotForDoctor(String doctorID)
      Displays the available slots for a specific doctor and prompts the user to select a slot for booking an appointment. If the selected slot is not valid, the method returns null. If no slots are available for the doctor, a message is displayed indicating so.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      Returns:
      The selected appointment date, or null if the selection is invalid or if no available slots are found.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static void scheduleAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, Date appointmentDate)
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with the specified doctor at the selected date and time. If the selected slot is unavailable, an error message is displayed. Once the appointment is scheduled, the slot is booked and the appointment is saved.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient scheduling the appointment.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor with whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      appointmentDate - The date and time of the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(String patientID)
      Reschedules an appointment to a new doctor and/or time slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient rescheduling the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(int appointmentID, String newDoctorID, Date newDate)
      Updates the details of an appointment (reschedules it).
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDoctorID - the new doctor's ID.
      newDate - the new appointment date.

    • approvePendingAppointments

      public static void approvePendingAppointments(String doctorID)
      Approves pending appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(String patientID, int appointmentID)
      Cancels an appointment by its ID and returns the slot back to the doctor's availability.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be canceled.

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      public static void viewUpcomingAppointments(String doctorID)
      Displays upcoming appointments (today and future) for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor.

    • getAppointmentsByDoctor

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID, AppointmentStatus status)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose appointments need to be retrieved.
      status - (optional) the status of the appointments to filter by. Pass `null` to retrieve all statuses.
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified doctor.

    • displayAppointmentsByDoctor

      public static void displayAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID, AppointmentStatus status)
      Displays all appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose appointments will be displayed.

    • formatDate

      public static String formatDate(Date date)
      Formats a given Date object into a readable string in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm".
      Parameters:
      date - the Date object to format.
      Returns:
      the formatted date string.

    • saveAppointments

      public static void saveAppointments()
      Saves the current list of appointments to a file. The HMS.data is saved in CSV format with appointment details, including the status and date.
